metadata.description: Core project management rules enforced throughout the SFG system

projectRules.title: BaseNumber Immutable
projectRules.detail: Always first in subject, filename, folder path

projectRules.title: Required Fields
projectRules.detail: BaseNumber, Prefix, Customer, Project, Location, ProductType

projectRules.title: Path Structure
projectRules.detail: Active and Completed are canonical roots

projectRules.title: Lifecycle
projectRules.detail: ENQ → QUO → ORD → INV → DEL → PAID audit trail
